## allocBytes() function

Create a new Uint8Array of the specified size, filled with zeros. Equivalent to `Buffer.alloc(size)`<!-- -->.

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare function allocBytes(size: number): Uint8Array;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

size


</td><td>

number


</td><td>

Size of the array


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

Uint8Array

New zero-filled array
